Class MarkerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g01.common.model.MarkerSendableModel

  • public class MarkerModel
extends be.ac.ulb.infof307.g01.common.model.MarkerSendableModel
    Represents a marker indicating that a pokemon was observed somewhere in space-time. A marker contains the time and location of a spotted pokemon, its stats ...

      • addUserVote

        public void addUserVote(String username,
                        boolean isUpVote)
                 throws InvalidParameterException
        Adds a user's vote to the marker. A vote is a user's appreciation of another user's marker, and can be positive or negative.
        Parameters:
        username - the user who adds the vote
        isUpVote - true if the vote is positive, false if negative
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException
